import React from 'react' import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import EachProductMobile from './EachProductMobile' const EachProduct = ({ products, tees }) => { const { tag } = useParams() console.log(products) return (

Back to Shop

{products.filter(product => product.tag === tag).map(product => (

{product.title}

$ {product.price}

{product.info}

))} {tees.filter(tee => tee.tag === tag).map(tee => (

{tee.title}

$ {tee.price}

{tee.info}

))}

9FIFTY
All Rights Reserved

) } export default EachProduct
